issue.title: [Java] Refactor method name for getstartOffset to use camel case
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5513](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5513). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The method getstartOffset in class org.apache.arrow.vector.BaseVariableWidthVector should be refactored to getStartOffset, to comply with the camel case.

Fortunately, this method is not public, so the changes are internal to Arrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5513?focusedCommentId=16860569) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4475
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4475>
